items.sentence: Tom abandoned his car that had run out of gasoline and started walking.
I want Tom to continue doing things just the way he\'s been doing them.
Don\'t eat anything your great-grandmother wouldn\'t recognize as food.
If you don\'t want to attend Tom\'s birthday party, you don\'t have to.
Today, I plan to talk about the importance of sports in modern society.
Tom decided not to say anything until he knew more about the situation.
I\'ve been thinking that it might be fun to go to Boston and visit Tom.
I\'ve promised to take Tom and Mary to the beach for a picnic tomorrow.
If both Tom and Mary go to prison, who\'ll take care of their children?
Tom should definitely visit an art museum or two while he\'s in France.
